Class Dendrogram

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:

    public class Dendrogram
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    This class represents the result of hierarchical clustering represented as a dendrogram

    Roberto Perdisci
